item.title: pyramid_fullauth 0.4 - python3 and few fixes
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
I've just released version 0.4 of my pyramid extension, pyramid_fullauth. It's goal is to allow to add authentication abilities - both password- and social-based authentication - to pyramid based apps by the means of configuration mostly.

This version comes with limited python3 compatibility, and two bugfixes.

item.title: pyramid_fullauth 0.3.0 released!
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
After over a month of work I've finally released version 0.3.0 of pyramid_fullauth! This release changes are mostly to testing the package, as with it, it finally reached 100% code coverage, but along I also introduced automatic style checking with pep8, pylint, pep257 and mccabe linter, so in-code changes were big enough, that I had to release it as a new minor version.
